title: Candara font family
content:
Hi,

I’m looking for other fonts that have characteristics of Candara.

If anyone has suggestions that would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,  
Curtis
author: curtis_eberhardt

comments.content:
Which characteristics of Candara are you looking for specifically?

If you are looking for a lapidary-type feel, what about going all the way with [Skia](http://web.archive.org/web/20090629112128/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/cartercone/skia-cc/), or maybe [Lithos](http://web.archive.org/web/20090629112128/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/lithos/) if you don’t mind the lack of a lowercase?
Why not Candara? It’s in interesting design, and with its Cyrillic/Greek well equipped. (And afaik by far not overused yet.)

I second Karsten.

For alternatives: Maybe [Magma](http://web.archive.org/web/20090629112128/http:/www.stonetypefoundry.com/magmaoverview.html) or [Versa Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20090629112128/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/ourtype/versa_sans_family_ot/)?

Thanks for all the help.

Curtis
